title: Pistachio biscotti
ingredients: ['110g caster sugar', '200g flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '2 large eggs', '3 tablespoons vegetable oil', 'zest of 1 orange', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon almond extract', '110g unsalted shelled pistachios', '100g dried cherries or cranberries, coarsely chopped']
